entry.title: 2016 & 2017 Seasons Greetings and New Year Holidays
entry.summary:
Please note that our office will be closed during the following time period for New Year Season.

Holiday period: from Thursday December 29, 2016 to Tuesday January 3, 2017

All non-urgent inquiries made during the holidays will be responded on January 4, 2017 or after. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause, and thank you for your consideration in this matter.

Team Xoxzo wishes you and your families all the best and having a great holiday welcoming the New Year.

entry.title: [Xoxzo] Price revision for Dial In Numbers
entry.summary:
Thank you for using our service, Xoxzo - Cloud Telephony Platform.

Please let us announce that the price on Incoming Call API will be revised due to the increased tariff of Toll Free numbers.

-----------------   ---------------------------------------------------------
Prefixes            Incoming Call price (shown in JPY credits, per minutes)
120 (Toll Free)     from JPY 40 to JPY 55 (+ 15 Credits per min.)
800 (Toll Free)     from JPY 40 to JPY 55 (+ 15 Credits per min.)
3                   from JPY 40 to JPY 10 ( -30  Credits per min.)
----------------- ---------------------------------------------------------

The new price will be effective on 2016-08-04 (Thu).

For any queries may arise, please contact support help@xoxzo.com

Thank you for your continuous support on Xoxzo,

Xoxzo Inc.
